Class Button

java.lang.Object
ui.Button
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeathScreenMenuButton, EditorBackButton, EditorChooseButton, EditorSaveButton, MenuButton, SelectionBackButton, SelectionCharacterButton, SelectionLevelButton, SelectionPlayButton, VictoryScreenSaveButton
public abstract class Button extends Object
This class is common for all buttons.
